q: : The winner of X Factor will be awarded$ 5 million record deal, the largest guaranteed prize in TV history. Simon Cowell also says he's glad that audiences are still interested in talent competitions. The good news is people are still excited about these shows- Idol, Dancing with the Stars, America's Got Talent- people, thank god, still like these shows and that gives me confidence for when we launch ours[ in the fall].

Of late, Sergio Marchionne is sounding increasingly optimistic about Chrysler as its fortunes improve, with U.S. sales rising 17 percent last year. I think our presence in Chrysler could not have been forecast, and certainly in hindsight it was probably one of the best things that could have happened to Fiat, he said last week in Italy.`` I think it is also one of the best things that could have happened to Chrysler, too.'' So he suggests that Mike Pence may be planning to announce only that he is not running for president, and withhold a formal declaration on running for governor until later. I don't think you're going to see a big press conference, said Ogle.`` When he does do it, I just think it will be a release that I have decided what I am NOT going to do, not what I am going to do.''

PanARMENIAN.Net- Google's Eric Schmidt is stepping aside as chief executive in April, and co-founder Larry Page is taking over. Google also announced that its board of directors had approved certain changes to Google's management team, the company said in a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission.`` Larry Page, Google's co-founder and president of products, will become Google's chief executive officer, effective April 4, 2011. Vermont Sen. Bernie Sanders ( technically an Independent, though he generally sides with Democrats) said Ryan's Roadmap would slash Social Security benefits and provide tax breaks for the wealthy, while raising taxes on just about everyone else. The fact of the matter is, Social Security has not contributed one nickel to our deficit or our national debt, and it must be protected, Sen. Bernie Sanders added. Monday afternoon Senate Democrats sent out a message noting that Ryan's Roadmap`` has now been endorsed by the House Majority Leader and the top Republicans on both the House and Senate

want the Bill Clinton and Congress to work together on the big issues, not least the economy. Larry Sabato said the Republican takeover of the House of Representatives gives the Bill Clinton a new political lease on life. Once the Tea Party members of the House start having a full airing of their views, Barack Obama will appear more moderate. He's going to be nicely positioned between the old Barack Obama and the new Republican House. I've said for more than a year that if the Democrats hold both the House and the Senate Barack Obama might be a one-term Bill Clinton . Now he has someone to blame and someone to make him to look better. Colin Powell , former secretary of state in the Bush administration who endorsed Barack Obama in the 2008 election, said the Bill Clinton was well positioned politically.`` He hasn't achieved all of his purposes, but he
